mapper.select: SELECT /* ThemeEpubMapper.XML, selectThemeEpubList, seung hun Lee, 2014-02-17 */ COUNT(*) OVER () AS TOTAL_COUNT , A.BNR_MENU_ID , A.BNR_SEQ , A.BNR_NM , A.BNR_DESC , A.BNR_INFO , A.PROD_ID , A.IMG_PATH , A.REG_DT , A.MENU_ID , A.BNR_TITLE FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TDBE.EXPO_ORD , TDBE.EXPO_STATUS_CD) RNUM , TDB.BNR_MENU_ID , TDB.BNR_SEQ , TDBE.BNR_NM , TDBE.BNR_DESC , TDB.BNR_INFO , DECODE( TDB.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , 'DP010303' , ( SELECT P.PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC P WHERE P.PROD_ID = TDB.BNR_INFO ) , '' ) PROD_ID , TDBI.IMG_PATH , TO_CHAR( TDB.REG_DT, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS' ) REG_DT , DECODE(TDB.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD, 'DP010306', TDB.BNR_INFO) MENU_ID , DECODE( TDB.BNR_INFO_TYPE_CD , 'DP010303' , ( SELECT P.PROD_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD_DESC P WHERE P.PROD_ID = TDB.BNR_INFO ) , 'DP010306' , ( SELECT C.MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_TENANT_MENU C WHERE C.TENANT_MENU_ID = TDB.BNR_INFO AND C.TENANT_ID = TDB.TENANT_ID) , 'DP010307' , ( SELECT R.LIST_NM FROM TB_DP_LIST R WHERE R.LIST_ID = TDB.BNR_INFO AND R.LIST_GRP_CD = 'ADR' AND R.TENANT_ID = TDB.TENANT_ID) , 'DP010309' , ( SELECT BS.BRAND_SHOP_NM FROM TB_DP_BRAND_SHOP BS WHERE BS.BRAND_SHOP_NO = TDB.BNR_INFO AND BS.TENANT_ID = TDB.TENANT_ID) , 'DP010310' , TDBE.BNR_NM ) AS BNR_TITLE FROM TB_DP_BNR TDB , TB_DP_BNR_EXPO TDBE , TB_DP_BNR_IMG TDBI , TB_DP_BNR_DVC TDBD , TB_CM_DEVICE TCD WHERE 1=1 AND TDB.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = TDBI.BNR_MENU_ID AND TDB.TENANT_ID = TDBI.TENANT_ID AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = TDBE.BNR_MENU_ID AND TDB.TENANT_ID = TDBE.TENANT_ID AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = TDBD.BNR_MENU_ID AND TDB.TENANT_ID = TDBD.TENANT_ID AND TDB.BNR_SEQ = TDBI.BNR_SEQ AND TDB.BNR_SEQ = TDBE.BNR_SEQ AND TDB.BNR_SEQ = TDBD.BNR_SEQ AND TDBD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = TCD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD /*AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = -BnrMenuId*/ AND TDB.BNR_MENU_ID = 'DP010917' /*AND (TCD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = -deviceModelCd OR L.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'android_standard2') header param : 단말모델코드 */ AND TCD.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = 'SHV-E230S' AND TDBE.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TCD.USE_YN = 'Y' AND tdbi.MOBILE_WEB_EXPO_YN = 'Y' ) A ORDER BY RNUM
